name: Just Number Clicker
description: This is just a number clicker. It's a clicker, and it's with numbers... When you click a big square button you get a random number between 0 and 100, when you sell the clicks, you increase the max. number you can reach. The score is the bigger number you have get randomly and the most max. you have, the less posibilities you have to get the maximun number, so the game difficulty increase automatically. How much you can reach?
